node.display_long_description:
Experience the freedom of zero-g movement and high energy competition in Echo VR! Team up with friends and clash against AI or opposing Echo Units in the Echo Arena. 

To find links to feedback and bug report forms as well as a great place to discuss your experience with the developers and other players go to the Echo Games Discord, https://discord.com/invite/vXbazs5

Please note that Echo VR requires Oculus runtime version 16 or greater. To check your runtime version, please go to "Settings", select "About" from menu, and check the version under "Runtime Version.‚Äù Your headset should automatically update if left on and connected to WiFi for an extended period of time.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
v23 brings a tighter dead zone. 
v23 brings official 90 hertz. 
Echo VR has a software release distance that is now tunable. 
Echo VR has a grip deadzone that is tunable. 
Less stale frames (e.g. less frame hiccups) which will help with more consistent shots and less overthrows. 
Overlapped rendering allows input to photon latency to go down from 44ms -> 30 ms. 
Input is sampled right before throwing to get the most up to date sensor reading - this can shave up to 6 ms off your throw for a tighter release window. 
Input from the last sensor reading is predicted out to the current time for a more consistent and stable throw. Before depending on when you got the sensor reading it could be 4 ms in the past or 1 ms in the past now it's always predicted to current time. 
Disc Curve has been added as an option on the Private Match Podium. 
The moderated lobby pop-up dialogue only needs to be accepted once per play session and not every time you enter a community moderated Social Lobby. 
The Follow Cam now follows the player more smoothly instead of following the disc. 
VOIP quality has been improved when a player is experiencing degraded network conditions.

nodes.title: Crossplay is now available in our Open Beta for Echo VR on Quest.
nodes.body_text: Echo Units who own an Oculus Quest or Oculus Rift can team up and compete for glory in zero-g together!

nodes.title: Open Beta for Echo VR on Quest is live!
nodes.body_text: The Echo VR Open Beta is now available for all Oculus Quest Owners to download and play. Oculus Rift crossplay will be available soon.

node.reviewDescription:
I didn‚Äôt even really read the description for Echo when I downloaded it. I skimmed several games and tried to put an assortment of entertainment for my bf, as well as our 8yo and 5yo. The game sat untouched for way too long... I opened it bored one evening and have barely been able to make myself share the VR üòÇüòÇ

I‚Äôm obsessed. I‚Äôve put my ~75yo parents on this game. I‚Äôm shoving it onto my friends. If you like competition, even if you hate frisbee as much as I do, GET THIS. GET IT RFN.

ultimate frisbee + zero gravity + full contact sport 

Description should read ‚ÄúTalk smack & punch mfkrs in the head to stun them and steal the stupid robo-disc.‚Äù

Say no more, I‚Äôm in!

MAKE SURE YOU GIVE YOURSELF PLENTY OF ROOM FOR THIS ONE. The more the better. The matches can get fast-paced with committed teammates, and it‚Äôs easy to lose track of where you‚Äôre standing. 

Maybe even put some tape down if you‚Äôve got ADHD af kids so they can see the boundary and know it‚Äôs an off limits area when someone is playing... bc my 5yo son totally walked WAY too close and I just BAP BAP BAP right into his head üòÇüòÇ poor dude.

I‚Äôm not even mad. 10/10 for Echo VR. A must have. So immersive, I sometimes forget when I take the headset off that I am not as weightless as I thought.

‚Äî‚Äî SUGGESTIONS FOR DEVS ‚Äî‚Äî

‚Ä¢ I‚Äôd like to see a way to add people from the random matches instead of the squeaker kids in the lobby.. the matches I‚Äôve played have been great, and I hate to see the match end and not be able to link back up and play with the ppl I have good chemistry with during a match. The match ends, I wind up back in the lobby with no way to go back and find the ppl I just brought the W home with.

‚Ä¢ Before the actual match starts, maybe a little huddle time for the respective teams to strategize and come up with a play for the match. Something longer than just 15 seconds. It‚Äôs a team competitive match, I‚Äôd like to be able to exercise some teamwork before the match, bc during the match it moves fast and everyone is talking over each other.

‚Ä¢ A filter to select an age range to play with. I love kids, I‚Äôve got four of them myself.. but I‚Äôd like to play with some ppl my age who would like to strategize and really go for gold on games.

website_page_meta.description:
Experience the freedom of zero-g movement and high energy competition in Echo VR! Load into the Echo VR social lobby to meet up with friends and customize your chassis before clashing against AI or opposing Echo Units in the Echo Arena.

To find links to feedback and bug report forms go to the Echo Games Discord, https://discord.com/invite/vXbazs5 

Please note that Echo VR requires Oculus runtime version 16 or greater.
